name: Save Pompeii!
description:
A game made on the Ludem Dare 50 game jam

Save the citizens of Pompeii from being exterminated by the raging volcano. Build ditches to direct the flow of lava away from the city. But beware that you only have so many resources to build!

NOTE: The ditches get destroyed if the lava touches it, so you have to build ahead of time. Also do restart the game if the game bugs out and you can't place things.

Controls

Right click : Move the camera
Right click & Scroll : Zoom
Right click & WASD : Pan the camera
Left click & WASD : Place ditches

Installation

Download the ZIP file and run the executable
